review: I love my fire stick, I have the snap box downstairs since the tv is older once installed the clarity is awful. I'm buying the fire stick for downstairs.  There should be more advertising of this product, I'm very happy.
author: Shanda Davis

review: Not bad, it is great! I like it. I will purchase an other unit.
author: Frankk

review: Slick packaging, easy to setup, great product!
author: Jeffrey Henry

review: easy to install - easy to use
author: jean kalemba

review: very simple to use and I get all the movies I could possibly watch
author: Joel B Ehrlich

review: Very nice and very fast. I was surprised.......I am enjoying this very much. Very easy setup... Kudos!!!!!!
author: John S. Lambertson

review: Skeptical at first but I must say, I am now a believer. Great connectivity, no buffering, user friendly my grandma can set it up just plug in and enjoy, very portable and great selection! If you are a prime member it's simply a no brainer.
author: Cesar D Velandia
